entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add documentation for TypeDefinitionDocument custom debug information #73816
  • Internal compiler crash when compiler diagnostic CS0103 is expected #73813
  • Accessibility issue in document outline window. #73810
    17.11 P3
  • Custom modifiers are not copied in array type collection expression lowering #73804
  • VS 17.10.0 preview 4 shows warnings where no Error is. #73802
  • Version 17.10.0 Preview 5.0 - Error list not showing all warnings #73801
  • Error list goes crazy while doing a refactoring #73800
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • Methods with Optional String Parameters Won't Collapse #73798
  • Adding/Removing space when toggling line comments #73796
  • Filesystem pollution in `/tmp/` #73795

Closed

  • IDE0130 is not reported correctly in 8.0.2xx #73261
  • C# Syntax highlighting of type references is broken #73803
  • IDE0100 (Remove unnecessary equality operator) catches `x == false` as redundant #73787
  • SourceGenerators: MSBuild property (and metadata?) values are (potentially) truncated before being passed to Generator #72592
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24281.3 #73817
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Optimize helper we use to determine the relevant node of a particular kind the user is on. #73812
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge partial properties feature to main #73815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cancel classification work for the portions of the view outside of hte viewport. #73811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change branch mapping #73807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Prepare partial properties feature for merge #73773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify fix-all code #73805
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Copy the ITelemetryReporter to a local before using #73790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more boolean simplification cases #73806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address a few locations also need to care about partial properties #73792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Perform nav bar computation in two passes #73786
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
